title: THE NEW CHAMPION
body: the new champion is a bard. not much is known about him yet. i think he will be a support, a bit like sona (i'm not sure)  and is supposed to be connected to azir, lissandra and sion. i may be wrong about that last part tho

replies.body:
Turns out it isn't male.
Turns out it is a deranged woman who used to be a bard who goes around strangling people to death with her lute strings.
10/10, please Rito.

We live up here on the mountains,
 We drink water from the fountains,

Over the fire we shale sing, 
 Peaceful songs that never sin,

With the night sky above,
 We sit back with love,

It will be a new day tomorrow,
 The river crab will fine it's hollow, 

The river crab is surprisingly helpful,
 In combination with  of my spells,         (wait a minute, that doesn't Rhyme at all)


Who am i?

-GL,HF
hehehe, it's supposed to be the new champion

Support seems about right. I mean Braum was the only true support released since Thresh.
